title: 【海外戰線求援】加拿大中文電台散播721假新聞以及抹黑爆眼義士

replies.msg:
https://www.facebook.com/groups/vanwah/permalink/1128275707371562/?sfnsn=mo

加拿大中文電台（溫哥華分台）節目主持梁燕城，公然響電台節目當中顛倒是非黑白，話721元朗打人事件係黑衣人由林卓廷帶領入去挑釁。將白衣人襲擊香港市民講成「黑白武鬥」，甚至話市民開消防喉自衛講成挑動721事件嘅事端！呢個所謂博士話自己睇曬直播影片，試圖令加拿大嘅華人聽眾相信佢嘅說話屬實！實在非常離譜！

另外，呢條友又話爆眼義士件事有好多假資訊，話除左蘋果一間話係布袋彈之外，所有報章都話係彈珠所傷, 甚至話無證明是警察做 !
各國都埋伏咗好多中國間諜
呢件事已經FC，希望有手足可以幫忙，將AM1470響溫哥華時間8月21日時事直擊 (News Talk)節目內，上午9點20分左右嘅部份擺上YouTube，唔好俾呢間電台刪除散播假新聞嘅證據！

各位巴打絲打，頂住呀！
路還很長，記住齊上齊落！
香港人可攻可守，智勇雙全！
記住永不分化！不割蓆！不篤灰！
It’s now or never

824 機場復活，WE WANT YOU，而家搭車犯法呀?

另外，拜託各位手足幫手，Send兩封電郵：
To:
News@am1470.com, general@am1470.com

Cc:
Georgelee@fm961.com

Subject -
強烈譴責梁燕城散播不實言論

本人強烈譴責梁燕城，於加西時時間二零一九年八月廿一日早上九時廿分，於電台AM1470時事直擊節目內，顛倒黑白，將721元朗白衣人無差別襲擊香港市民事件，說成「黑白武鬥」。更甚者，將市民開動消防喉噴水以作自衛行動，說成是挑動721事件開端。雖然口口聲聲說是已觀看所有直播影片，卻顛倒黑白，混淆是非，虛構事實，本人對此等可恥行為，予以強烈譴責。

本人在此謹勸貴台立即發出公開聲明交代事件，並譴責梁燕城借用貴台的節目時段來發放虛假消息 (fake news)，以及承諾對梁燕城此人從此永不錄用。如貴台對梁不予譴責、依舊聘用／邀請為貴台節目嘉賓，我等必將事情投訴至 CRTC，務求達到要影響貴台牌照。

另一封係寫俾加拿大廣播基準委員會（CBSC）
https://www.cbsc.ca/make-a-complaint/

Name of Radio Station:
CJVB Fairchild Radio AM1470

Program Name:
News Talk

Date of Program:
August 21, 2019

Time of Program:
9:20 AM

Specific Concern:
I am very distressed by the false accusation and fake news broadcasted during radio program News Talk on AM1470 (CJVB Fairchild Radio, Vancouver). I am now writing to complain and express my displeasure with Mr. Liang Yancheung’s irresponsible behavior, and demand CBSC to take action in preventing more slanders and lies being aired on AM1470.

At approximately 9:20am on Auguest 21, 2019, Mr. Liang Yancheung, commented on the Triad Attack targeting Hong Kong civilians that occurred on July 21, 2019. According to his words, he reviewed all live feeds and put the blame on the civilians for provoking the “locals” to attack. Mr. Liang even went as far as calling the civilian’s defense against armed attackers with a fire-hose as “the action that started the whole incident”. There are many videos during the attack, including a reporter beaten live on camera by these white-shirt triad thugs that can be served as solid evidence that Mr. Liang’s statements are untrue. Furthermore, his blaming of the victims is disgusting and completely unacceptable.

Mr. Liang has been very vocal as a Beijing supporter, and he had history of defaming victims, including a woman who suffered permanent blindness from police shooting in Hong Kong. I am seriously concerned about AM1470’s neutrality with the way they handle the anti-extradition protest in Hong Kong. I believe Mr. Liang Yancheung is unfit to host or participate in any current event programs on AM1470, and demand of his immediate removal.
各位手足唔該幫手！

海外手足求支援！
大家唔係由得外國嘅華人媒體繼續抹黑爆眼義士同721受害者呀嘛？
為共匪助紂為虐嘅人渣不得好死
投訴投訴
人類社會就是充滿這些豪無正直心(Integrity) 的人。

一封電郵，一份表格
有曬資料架啦，阻你幾分鐘就可以防止義士繼續被抹黑！
聲討梁燕城，立即革職！
個梁燕城同習近平好似樣,係咪親戚黎
推

Name of Radio Station: CJVB Fairchild Radio AM1470
Program Name: News Talk
Date of Program: August 21, 2019
Time of Program: 9:20 AM

Specific Concern:
I am very distressed by the false accusation and fake news broadcasted during radio program News Talk on AM1470 (CJVB Fairchild Radio, Vancouver). I am now writing to complain and express my displeasure with Mr. Thomas In-Sing Leung’s (aka Liang Yancheung) irresponsible behavior, and demand CBSC to take action in preventing more slanders and lies being aired on AM1470.

At approximately 9:20am on August 21, 2019, Mr. Leung commented on the Triad Attack targeting Hong Kong civilians that occurred on July 21, 2019. According to his words, he reviewed all live feeds and put the blame on the civilians for provoking the “locals” to attack. Mr. Leung even went as far as calling the civilian’s defense against armed attackers with a fire-hose as “the action that started the whole incident”. There are many videos during the attack, including a reporter beaten live on camera by the white-shirt triad thugs that can be served as solid evidence that Mr. Leung's statements are untrue. Furthermore, his blaming of the victims is disgusting and completely unacceptable.

Mr. Leung has been very vocal about being a Beijing supporter, and he had history of defaming victims, including a woman who suffered permanent blindness from police shooting in Hong Kong. I am seriously concerned about AM1470’s neutrality with the way they handle the anti-extradition protest in Hong Kong. I believe Mr. Thomas In-Sing Leung is unfit to host or participate in any current event programs on AM1470, and demand of his immediate removal.

quote.msg:
另一封係寫俾加拿大廣播基準委員會（CBSC）
https://www.cbsc.ca/make-a-complaint/

Name of Radio Station:
CJVB Fairchild Radio AM1470

Program Name:
News Talk

Date of Program:
August 21, 2019

Time of Program:
9:20 AM

Specific Concern:
I am very distressed by the false accusation and fake news broadcasted during radio program News Talk on AM1470 (CJVB Fairchild Radio, Vancouver). I am now writing to complain and express my displeasure with Mr. Liang Yancheung’s irresponsible behavior, and demand CBSC to take action in preventing more slanders and lies being aired on AM1470.

At approximately 9:20am on Auguest 21, 2019, Mr. Liang Yancheung, commented on the Triad Attack targeting Hong Kong civilians that occurred on July 21, 2019. According to his words, he reviewed all live feeds and put the blame on the civilians for provoking the “locals” to attack. Mr. Liang even went as far as calling the civilian’s defense against armed attackers with a fire-hose as “the action that started the whole incident”. There are many videos during the attack, including a reporter beaten live on camera by these white-shirt triad thugs that can be served as solid evidence that Mr. Liang’s statements are untrue. Furthermore, his blaming of the victims is disgusting and completely unacceptable.

Mr. Liang has been very vocal as a Beijing supporter, and he had history of defaming victims, including a woman who suffered permanent blindness from police shooting in Hong Kong. I am seriously concerned about AM1470’s neutrality with the way they handle the anti-extradition protest in Hong Kong. I believe Mr. Liang Yancheung is unfit to host or participate in any current event programs on AM1470, and demand of his immediate removal.

replies.msg:
Check過，佢地故意冇Email Address

All complaints must be made in writing. They can be sent via the webform, postal mail, or fax. Addresses for each method of communication as well as further information on what should be included in your complaint can be found at Making a Complaint. Complaints must be received within 28 days of the date of broadcast.

所有投訴都需要以書面形式進行，可以用Online Form，寄信，或者FAX（竟然仲有人堅持用Fax....） 而且必須響節目播出嘅28內作出投訴

quote.msg:
另外，拜託各位手足幫手，Send兩封電郵：
To:
News@am1470.com, general@am1470.com

Cc:
Georgelee@fm961.com

Subject -
強烈譴責梁燕城散播不實言論

本人強烈譴責梁燕城，於加西時時間二零一九年八月廿一日早上九時廿分，於電台AM1470時事直擊節目內，顛倒黑白，將721元朗白衣人無差別襲擊香港市民事件，說成「黑白武鬥」。更甚者，將市民開動消防喉噴水以作自衛行動，說成是挑動721事件開端。雖然口口聲聲說是已觀看所有直播影片，卻顛倒黑白，混淆是非，虛構事實，本人對此等可恥行為，予以強烈譴責。

本人在此謹勸貴台立即發出公開聲明交代事件，並譴責梁燕城借用貴台的節目時段來發放虛假消息 (fake news)，以及承諾對梁燕城此人從此永不錄用。如貴台對梁不予譴責、依舊聘用／邀請為貴台節目嘉賓，我等必將事情投訴至 CRTC，務求達到要影響貴台牌照。

replies.msg: 屌佢老母，二戰中日都互有攻守，抗乜撚日

事發幾日，新時代一直冇做出交代
冇道歉，反而當梁燕城繼續講埋d似中立但繼續顛倒是非嘅論點
正如樓上所講，互有攻防呢句響而家嘅情況根本唔適合
正如一個女人被強姦嘅途中踢咗強姦犯一腳
咁個強姦犯就唔洗拉？
事實上，而家幾百個白衫嘅施暴者當中，告咗幾多個？
相比之下，有幾多示威手足已經被判埋？
新時代集團唔洗旨意拖28日等件事過咗CSBC嘅追究期！
